title: Discover Pattonville Airport in MSFS: A Hidden Gem for Aviation Enthusiasts
description:
Welcome to Pattonville Airport (EDTQ) in Microsoft Flight Simulator! Nestled in the north of Stuttgart, Germany, this small general aviation airport is home to eight flying clubs and the Christoph 51 medical helicopter base. This addon brings Pattonville to life with an improved ground layout, custom-built objects, and detailed scenery. Whether youâ€™re soaring in a glider or piloting a single-engine plane, Pattonville offers a unique and immersive flying experience. Download now and explore the skies like never before!

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
